title.rendered: Summer Delight: Browse the new edition of Esplanade View

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column video_bg=”yes” video_bg_url=””][vc_column_text]

Enjoy the latest stories and events from Esplanade, find your corner for relaxation and browse through the new Spring/Summer edition of the prestigious Esplanade View magazine.

Discover the new bridal collection of the popular designer duo Envy Room, learn everything about the brilliant winner of the Golden Camera in Cannes, read an inspired interview with amazing artist Ivana Armanini who innovatively uses comics as a medias, and meet Esplanade’s talented chef Milan Nižić.  Discover wonderful places to visit in the city and find out which museums are suitable for different age groups.

Browse the online version or visit the hotel to pick up your personal copy.

Enjoy your reading!

Cover photo: Franjo Matković

Published: 7.6.2024.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered: Relax with the interesting new stories and events from Hotel Esplanade. Find your favorite spot for relaxation and browse through the new spring/summer edition of the exclusive Esplanade View magazine.
